definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: Peope not only need the life necessities,but also comfortable life.
sentences.chinese: 人們不僅需要生活必需品，還想生活得舒適。

sentences.english: They had few essential supplies, to begin with, so they had to improvise.
sentences.chinese: 開始時他們沒有多少生活必需品，所以只好東拼西湊。

sentences.english: People do not only need necessities, but also comfortableness.
sentences.chinese: 人們不僅需要生活必需品，還想生活得舒適。

sentences.english: Basic necessities are often at a premium during a war.
sentences.chinese: 戰爭時期，基本生活必需品常常奇缺。

sentences.english: These are our necessaries of life.
sentences.chinese: 這些是我們的生活必需品。

sentences.english: In reality there are very few things we really need.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，只有很少的東西是我們的生活必需品。

definition: consumer goods/means of livelihood/means of subsistence/documents relating to sb's life
(lit.) oil, salt, soy sauce and vinegar/(fig.) the trivia of everyday life
non-staple foods/(Tw) solids (food for infants other than breast milk and formula)
clothing, food, housing and transport (idiom); people's basic needs
